txt.en:
'Scouts report that strong forces from Isengard are marching upon Galtrev...surely to take retribution for our defiance of the White Hand Overseers.

'Will you help us to defend the village?'


<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This is a solo quest and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
'You were a great help against the marauding villains of Isengard, [placeholder]! Please, choose a reward as a token of Galtrev's gratitude.'
'Let us prepare for the attack, Duvodiad!'
Scouts report that forces of the White Hand have been seen marching on Galtrev, surely as an act of revenge for what was done to the Overseers of Galtrev.
Talk to Bron to defend Galtrev
Bron is at Galtrev.\n\nTalk to Bron to defend Galtrev.
Bron is in Galtrev at the milestone marker in the centre of town.\n\nYou should speak with Bron to collect your reward for assisting in the defence of Galtrev.
